name: M Mania
description: m-Mania is a classic real-time strategy game with a top view. Your task is to build a base, raise an army and destroy enemies on the map. Provide dominance over the planet m-Mania, defeating enemies in 15 exciting missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 1 core 2000 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÂ® 9.0
